title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.4 - Review and determination by the department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 374.4 - Review and determination by the department

State Regulations

When the department has received a written request for
review, the department will review the arguments and evidence submitted by the
individual. The department will issue a written response to the individual
which will be the final determination of the department. The department will
not be entitled to receive an overpayment of State tax, until the time for
requesting a review of the department's determination as set forth in section
374.2
(d) of this

Part has expired, or, when such request for a review was timely made, until a
written response has been issued by the department advising the individual that
retention of the overpayment of State tax by the department is
proper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
374.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
